articles.title: Audi Q8 e-tron and Q8 Sportback e-tron launched in India with more than 500 KM Range - Business Insider India
articles.description: Audi has announced the launch of the Q8 e-tron and the Q8 Sportback e-tron electric cars in India.
articles.content: The cars come with a panoramic sunroof, 10.1-inch infotainment screen, 8.6-inch HVAC control screen, digital instrument cluster, Bang & Olufsen speaker system, four-zone climate control and more.
